author: milos88
content: I created PR (https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/pull/407) to define new History Netowrk (old network was renamed to "Legacy History")

author: __flcl
content: Do we still use Portal Network Implementers Call?

author: milos88
content:
No. Do you think there is a need for a regular one?

I think the plan is to have them periodically, when there is something to share and discuss. <@543900561460822016> , can you confirm?

author: milos88
content: Created another PR (https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/pull/408) that adds `chain_id` to the ENR record (better support for devnets, testnets, l2-networks, etc)
